secText:
Lesson:
1. Explore projectile motion by [OBJ:actsec_jr233232:firing a cannon].
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_d468:projectile motion].
3. Describe the projectile motion of a [OBJ:expsec_jr233442:human cannonball].
4. Determine how to [OBJ:actsec_jx1:juggle using the x and y velocity components].
5. Analyze [OBJ:expsec_c385:graphs of projectile motion].
6. Determine the [OBJ:actsec_ya41:velocity and acceleration of a soccer ball on the moon] using the position-time projectile motion graph.
7. [OBJ:expsec_d470:Calculate projectile motion] based on time and displacement.
8. [OBJ:der_projectile_horizontal_equation:Derive the horizontal projectile motion equation] for time.
9. [OBJ:actsec_jk1:Aim a bazooka] using projectile motion equations.
